995a5605-a8ac-4f47-9855-3e1b1d601c0c.description: The Wiley Certified Python Programmer Course and Certification helps individuals master key Python programming concepts including file operations, object-oriented programming, working with data, and introduce you to various Python libraries such as Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, which are essential for Data Science or Machine Learning. The duration of the course is 1 month with 16 hours of live online classes and 40 hours of coursework and assignments.
995a5605-a8ac-4f47-9855-3e1b1d601c0c.name: Wiley Certified Python Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals participating in the course needs to achieve a minimum score of 40% in the Check Your Python Quotient assessment that is conducted post completion of the course.

1da4cdc3-0ba8-4546-9190-374eb67fd1aa.description: Design Thinking is a structured human-centric approach to design and develop products, services, and experiences. 216288b2-af2e-4e74-b65b-5f1824c48e2b.description: Discover the NXT in Women's Scholarship. Earners of this badge have demonstrated outstanding performance in rigorous WileyNXT assessments or program selection processes. This scholarship is in alignment with the vision of WileyNXT (a Wiley brand) to develop the workforce of the digital transformation era and bring women to the forefront of this journey to the destination. Winner's of the Scholarship receive partial or full refund of the program fees for which they have been enrolled.
